column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A man driving a Toyota Prius crashed into a concrete barrier
column4: badly damaging his car.------The incident happened at 11 pm on September 12
column6: along the Wat Tangkasang railway in Ta Nguon I village
column9: Phnom Penh.------According to sources at the scene
column11: a man was seen driving a navy blue Toyota Prius with license plate Phnom Penh 2AS-9646 traveling from south to north when he arrived at the scene. The car hit the road barrier
column12: causing one of the wheels to break. The car owner then pushed the car to the side of the road. ------NKD
